{!Contact.FirstName}'s meeting points for NCS
Dear Parent/Guardian of {!Contact.Name},
Thank you for your application for {!Contact.Name} to take part in NCS. We hope they are looking forward to spending some of their summer with us.
They currently have a confirmed* place starting on {!Wave_Selection__c.PC_KO_Day__c} for the programme with meeting points in {!Wave__c.Boroughs_or_areas__c} borough. However, we have noticed that this is outside of their school’s borough.
If {!Contact.Name} is unable to travel to this location and you would like to change to a different one, please call us as soon as possible on 0203 542 2400. We will then try our best to place them on a more suitable programme.
Yours sincerely,
style="margin: 0px 0px 20px; padding: 0px;">
Tanya Dunne Head of Customer Services - The Challenge
*If you haven’t received a confirmation letter or email yet, do bear with us, we are processing thousands of applications as quickly as we can.
VISIT NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG NOW
